title: Guy Pearce cuts a noticeably slim figure in New York
title_page: Guy Pearce cuts a noticeably slim figure in New York | Daily Mail Online
text:
He the Australian actor who is known for changing up his look on and off the screen.
But on Thursday Guy Pearce cut an unusually slender figure when he stepped out in New York to promote his new film Brimstone.
The 49-year-old looked a world away from the buff body he sported last September while filming upcoming flick Flammable Children on the Queensland coast.
Slimming in black: Guy Pearce looked noticeably slimmer while out promoting new film Brimstone in New York on Thursday
Sporting dark wash jeans and a black long sleeve shirt, the Memento actor looked chic and casual as he stopped by the Build Series to talk about the Western thriller.
He wore his trademark rimmed glasses, slicking his two-toned locks back and showing off a hint of stubble on his chiselled jaw.
The Hollywood star carried a dark grey jacket to ward of the cities chilly weather, pairing his look with brown lace-up shoes and a black satchel slung over his arm.
Basic black: The Hollywood star opted for a casual ensemble, consisting of dark wash jeans and a long ebony top
Slick style: Carrying his jacket and bag, the 49-year-old actor slicked his hair back, sporting a subtle shadow of stubble
Sleek and stylish: Sporting dark wash jeans and a black long sleeve shirt, the Memento actor looked chic and casual
The Australian actor took time out of his busy filming schedule to promote the movie which will be released in Australia next month.
It follows the story of a young wife, played by Dakota Fanning, who must rise up against the new reverend when he threatens to take everything she loves away from her.
Pearce plays the intimidating religious figure in the picture, which also stars Game of Thrones alums Kit Harington and his now-partner Carice Van Houten.
During filming for the movie, Guy famously fell in love with the brunette beauty, with the two welcoming a baby boy last year.
'A cute little package arrived and told us his name's Monte Pearce. We think we're gonna keep him. Placenta smoothie anyone?' Guy tweeted.
Out promoting: Brimstone tells the story a young wife, played by Dakota Fanning, who must rise up against the new reverend
Match-making movie: Guy met Carice Van Houten, the mother of his son Monte, during filming for the Western thriller
Guy is known for transforming his figure for a number of his previous roles, including adopting a gruelling workout regime for 2015's Results and packing on 10kg of muscle for 2012's Lockout.
He also lost weight while starring in 2011 mini-series Mildred Pierce where he played Monty Beregan alongside Kate Winslet's title character.
The Emmy Award winner transformed once again last October, when he showed off a toned and taut figure while filming for upcoming release Flammable Children.
